recipe.title: Coconut Date Slices
recipe.ingredients: 2 c Sugar 1 tb Light corn syrup 3/4 c Evaporated milk 6 3/4 oz Pitted dates 2 tb Butter 1 c Chopped nuts 1/2 ts Vanilla extract 1/8 ts Salt 1 1/2 c Flaked coconut, toasted
recipe.steps: Mix first 3 ingredients in saucepan. Cook, stirring, until a small amount of mixture forms a soft ball when dropped in cold water (232-F). 2. Add dates; cook, stirring, until mixture returns to 232-F. Remove from heat, and cool to lukewarm (110-F). Add remaining ingredients, except coconut, and beat until thick. Shape in 2 or 3 rolls 1 1/2" in diameter. Roll in coconut. When firm, cut in 1/2" slices.
